dict.acceptation: 可笑的，荒谬的；荒唐的，愚蠢的；胡枝扯叶；

sent.orig: Those who are serious in ridiculous matters will be ridiculous in serious matters.---Cato the Elder.
sent.trans: 在愚蠢的事情上用劲，在该用劲的时候就会愚蠢。

sent.orig: It's crazy fun, with a ridiculous plot and even more ridiculous action scenes.
sent.trans: 那些古灵精怪的情节和更为匪夷所思的动作场面简直有趣极了。

sent.orig: They are no longer feared as dangerous or subversive but anachronistic and slightly ridiculous.
sent.trans: 他们不再被人们警惕为危险或破坏分子，而是一个时代观念混乱、稍显荒唐的群体。

sent.orig: This ridiculous scene in the boiling point on the network television channel New Books!
sent.trans: 这荒唐的一幕就出现在沸点网络电视新书推荐频道上！

sent.orig: Man must look as ridiculous to the crab when It'sees him walk forward.
sent.trans: 人种在螃蟹望回必定也是很可笑的，由于人种竟然是向前走的。
